ygData.subject: Re: The Return
ygData.msgSnippet: Apocalypse stopped in his tracks. Guiledart gave a nod. He turned to his new destron friends. We must go see Magamtron. We will meet you at your base soon

Received: from unknown (HELO web9010.mail.yahoo.com) (216.136.128.172) by mta2 with SMTP; 23 Apr 2001 00:08:19 -0000
Message-ID: <20010423000819.20921.qmail@...>
Received: from [152.163.194.207] by web9010.mail.yahoo.com; Sun, 22 Apr 2001 17:08:19 PDT
Date: Sun, 22 Apr 2001 17:08:19 -0700 (PDT)
Subject: Re: The Return
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
In-Reply-To: <9bv7fk+2fcc@...>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@...>

Apocalypse stopped in his tracks. Guiledart gave a
nod. He turned to his new destron friends. "We must go
see Magamtron. We will meet you at your base soon
enough." They jetted off towards the Sulaco.
--- t882hcc91@... wrote:
> Magmatron:
> 
>      The same opening that had allow Magmatron to
> leave this galaxy 
> also allowed him to return. He was back in the
> Sulaco, it looked the 
> same as when he left it. Only dustier. Magmatron
> also had a new body. 
> The great head of the black TM2 allosaurus poked
> it's way through the 
> portal. Then the rest stepped through. He
> transformed to his new 
> robot mode, he looked somewhat like a cross between
> TM2 Megatron (the 
> allosaur tail on the back of the head) and Tigerhawk
> (allosaur head 
> on his shoulder)
>      "SLAG!!" He roared. He typed in a few button
> and the autoguns 
> came online, breaking away all the rock that had
> once surrounded the 
> Sulaco. The rock flew from the ship with a huge
> force. "Apocalypse, 
> get to the Sulaco, now. I have war to discuss with
> you."
>      Magmatron paid no heed as Cerberus crawled
> behind him.
> 
> Cerberus:
> 
>      In his new Techno-organic body he was capable
> of cloaking, a 
> technology he had copied from Dachande. He crept
> quickly by 
> Magmatron, the "leader" not even knowing. He got out
> of the base and 
> headed towards a cave, decloaking as he did.
> 
> 
> Dachande:
> 
>      A transdimensional rift opened and Dachande was
> thrown out of 
> it. He slammed into the ground hard. He had gotten
> rid of his cursed 
> beast mode, and the only true way for Magmatron to
> command him. Now 
> all Dachande wanted to do was find Battera and
> eliminate Magmatron 
> once and for all.
> 
>
